column6:
From the pages of INCREDIBLE HERCULES comes...yeah, you guessed it, Hercules! The Lion of Olympus, still wanted for crimes against S.H.I.E.L.D., collides with our bounty-hunting She-Hulk. The question is, given these two combustible characters' current mindset and situation with the law, will they meet as longtime friends...or bitter foes? ,2008,6
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Rainier Beredo | colorist:Chris Sotomayor | writer:Peter David | inker:Mike Deodato | inker:Victor Olazaba | penciller:Val Semeiks | letterer:Dave Sharpe
